room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the horcrux and the zombie rooms - they were AWESOME! The rooms were done well and the puzzles made sense and worked well with the themes. Everyone running the rooms was friendly and gave good clues.A note about the zombie one: if you’re a scaredy cat like me, but like to be scared - this one is for you! It was a “jumpy” and suspenseful kind of scariness - which I liked! It was not gory or too gruesome.There’s one room left for us to do, but I hope they’re able to add more rooms later, as I really enjoyed what they’ve done!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our family had a great time this past weekend at Alcatraz Escape Games! This was most of our first escape room experience and it was awesome. We did the Zombie Panic and we feel like it was very well done. The staff was friendly and very helpful, making sure we had a great time. we look forward to coming back and trying the others.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Panic" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We were so close to finishing our mission. We enjoyed the zombie room for our first ever escape room experience.
